ABOUT.TITLE: About me
ABOUT.DESCRIPTION: Hi, I am a German-speaking Frontend Developer based near Hamburg. Motivated by the limitless opportunities within IT, I am excited about crafting visually captivating and intuitive websites and applications.
ABOUT.LOCATION: Flexible in terms of working environments, I can work effectively around Winsen to LÃ¼neburg or Hamburg and remotely.
ABOUT.BULB: I am open-minded and always looking for personal challenges to constantly improve my knowledge and skills.
ABOUT.PUZZLE: In my profession, programming isn't just about writing code; it's a creative form of problem-solving. I take pride in my ability to distill complex technical challenges into simple, user-friendly solutions. This way, I help you achieve your goals and bring your visions to life.

SECOND.TITLE: Ich habe Erfahrung in der Erstellung von Projekten mit verschiedenen Frontend-Technologien und Konzepten gesammelt.
